name: Cleaning Day - A Big Springs Story
name_original: Cleaning Day - A Big Springs Story
description:
Join the sanitation Department of Big Springs City and use patented Spring-X technology to clean up the streets in this Room-Scale VR entry in Unreal Engine's 2017 Spring Game Jam!

Using your Spring-X Extendo arms, catch things beings thrown from a nearby apartment building and sort them into waste and reusables. Be careful, sort something in the wrong bin and you'll lose points. Can you get a high score?

  • Developed in 3+ days for a #ue4jam
  • Virtual reality game for HTC Vive
  • Somewhat-lovingly handcrafted voxel models!
  • Sproingy sounds and slinky arms!
  • Boombox-punching, music playing actions!
  • A tiny hint of backstory!
  • ...and not much more!

HTC VIVE VR Controls
Motion Controller Trigger - Grab with associated hand
Motion Controller Top Button - Extend spring-loaded wrists

Tips

  • Grab the Boombox in the load area for music.
  • Grab the Time Clock to start the stage.
  • Time remaining is displayed on your right wrist.
  • Score is displayed on your left wrist.
  • Controllers rumble when in contact with an object.
